title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 82-1.4 - Staffing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 82-1.4 - Staffing

State Regulations
(a) A health systems agency shall have appropriate staff to fulfill health planning and development activities and functions as defined in section
82-1.6
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
82-1.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
